column4: What do I do when a guide tells me to go to "System" > "Administration" > "Software Properties", yet on my system I have "System"> "Administration"> "Software Sources" ?
go to it
the guide is old, not your system
read the link you just pasted
it's the same thing... a gui app where you mark a checkbox for the repos you want
what do you mean?  Does it just pop up randomly?
weird... did you check in system
I close it, it re-opens. I minimize it, it maximizes.
check what, exactly?
never mind, I was going to suggest checking the settings in "session" but that would not account for the maximizing.  Does it happen with a fresh new user?
let me try
yes, it occurs on new users
the problem remains constant with new users.
what version of ubuntu? When did it start happening?
I'm on 7.1, and I believe its been like this since I installed the last update for 7.04 before 7.1 came out.
I'm on 7.1, and I believe its been like this since I installed the last update for 7.04 before 7.1 came out.
I saw, just give me a couple of minutes :)  If you kill the process in a terminal it still respawns?
what did you ask me to try (for the music player) in console?
I saw, just give me a couple of minutes :)  If you kill the process in a terminal it still respawns?
can you give me a code to enter? I'm still new with linux.
join me in #ubuntu-classroom
